summary: An alternate facial appearance for Ulfric Stormcloak
descriptionHtml:
Notice: There are now 4 different files for download, bald Ulfric, taller bald Ulfric, the Vladimir Kulich Ulfric, and (my personal favourite) an alternate Ulfric with vanilla hair. Hopefully this is a satisfying variety for everyone, tell your friends and endorse the mod if you enjoy the new looks.


I decided to make an alternate look for Ulfric Stormcloak, one that gave him the image of a man who\'s been leading a rebel force and faced a lot of hardship and loss throughout his life. As it stands, while I like the vanilla Ulfric, he does have a fairly \'pretty boy\' look about him and I think he lacks the look of a man who could inspire younger men to go and give their lives for the cause. 

This is ideal for those who want to start a new playthough and have an Ulfric Stormcloak who is different in appearance, and who want a mod that may even give them a different view of the man personally, by this I mean that when I was testing it, I found that listening to Ulfric with his new, more rugged appearance, actually seemed to suit what he was saying more than his younger self, anyway I hope you enjoy.

-----------------------------------------------------------

I want to credit Subconscious, a member on the site, for explaining the process of modding this piece to me and being very patient with my questions, without him I doubt I would have been able to get this finished. Thanks a lot mate.

Obviously thanks goes to Bethesda for creating the character of Ulfric Stormcloak.

Thanks to everyone who endorses this mod.
author: Sky999
